description: This is the entry point file for a React-based frontend application. It imports React and ReactDOM, as well as styling and the main App component, then renders the App component within a strict mode boundary into the DOM element with ID 'root'.

methods.name: createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the component into the DOM.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the React element tree into the DOM element.
